thread.title: MUNOT/SANDEEP DEEPAK

author: MUNOT/SANDEEP DEEPAK
title: MUNOT/SANDEEP DEEPAK
text: My case was reviewed by Mr. Ajay Kumar. he given me the best possible fares and good flights for my Itinerary. He is very best at communication and taking each and every possible step for customer satisfaction. I will rate Mr. Ajay Kumar 10/10 for his good service. I am impressed with your and Ajay services. In future i would like to suggest my friends to book a ticket with you.
